( #{selfUsedRecord.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{selfUsedRecord.lsh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selfUsedRecord.mxh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selfUsedRecord.iymInventoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{selfUsedRecord.gsmGoodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{selfUsedRecord.ph,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selfUsedRecord.pch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selfUsedRecord.splitQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{selfUsedRecord.quantity,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{selfUsedRecord.costPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{selfUsedRecord.averageCostPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{selfUsedRecord.purchaseTaxRate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{selfUsedRecord.sellTaxRate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{selfUsedRecord.producedDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{selfUsedRecord.expiryDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{selfUsedRecord.pemSupplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{selfUsedRecord.iymInventoryAddId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{selfUsedRecord.notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selfUsedRecord.sysClinicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{selfUsedRecord.creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{selfUsedRecord.creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{selfUsedRecord.approverId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{selfUsedRecord.approveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{selfUsedRecord.approveState,jdbcType=TINYINT} )
mapper.select:
select * from view_iym_self_used_record
(sysClinicId = #{sysClinicId}) and
(DATE_FORMAT(creationDate, '%Y-%m-%d') between #{creationDate[0]} and #{creationDate[1]}) and
(approveState = #{approveState}) and
(sysClinicName like '${sysClinicName}%' or sysClinicCode like '${sysClinicName}%') and
(lsh like '${lsh}%') and
order by creationDate desc, mxh

(lsh like '${lsh}%') and
group by lsh order by creationDate desc
